00020 Model::Model(QDomNode &modelNode): views_(), ports_(), modelParameters_() {
00021         for (int i = 0; i < modelNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00022                 QDomNode tempNode = modelNode.childNodes().at(i);
00023 
00024                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:views")) {
00025 
00026                         // go through all the views
00027                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00028                                 QDomNode viewNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00029                                 if (!viewNode.isComment()) {
00030                                         views_.append(QSharedPointer<View>(
00031                                                         new View(viewNode)));
00032                                 }
00033                         }
00034 
00035                 }
00036                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:ports")) {
00037 
00038                         // go through all ports
00039                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00040                                 QDomNode portNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00041                                 if (!portNode.isComment()) {
00042                                         Port* port = new Port(portNode);
00043                                         ports_.insert(port->getName(), QSharedPointer<Port>(port));
00044                                 }
00045                         }
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:modelParameters")) {
00049 
00050                         // go through all model parameters
00051                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00052                                 QDomNode modelParameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00053                                 if (!modelParameterNode.isComment()) {
00054 
00055                                         ModelParameter* parameter =
00056                                                         new ModelParameter(modelParameterNode);
00057                                         modelParameters_.insert(parameter->getName(),
00058                                                         QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(parameter));
00059                                 }
00060                         }
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         return;
00064 }

00069 Model::Model( const Model &other ):
00070 views_(),
00071 ports_(),
00072 modelParameters_() {
00073 
00074         foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, other.views_) {
00075                 if (view) {
00076                         QSharedPointer<View> copy = QSharedPointer<View>(
00077                                 new View(*view.data()));
00078                         views_.append(copy);
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> >::const_iterator i = other.ports_.begin();
00083                 i != other.ports_.end(); ++i) {
00084                         if (i.value()) {
00085                                 QSharedPointer<Port> copy = QSharedPointer<Port>(
00086                                         new Port(*i.value().data()));
00087                                 ports_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00088                         }
00089         }
00090 
00091         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> >::const_iterator i = other.modelParameters_.begin();
00092                 i != other.modelParameters_.end(); ++i) {
00093                         if (i.value()) {
00094                                 QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> copy = QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(
00095                                         new ModelParameter(*i.value().data()));
00096                                 modelParameters_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00097                         }
00098         }
00099 }

00101 Model& Model::operator=( const Model &other ) {
00102         if (this != &other) {
00103                 
00104                 views_.clear();
00105                 foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, other.views_) {
00106                         if (view) {
00107                                 QSharedPointer<View> copy = QSharedPointer<View>(
00108                                         new View(*view.data()));
00109                                 views_.append(copy);
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 ports_.clear();
00114                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> >::const_iterator i = 
00115                  other.ports_.begin();
00116                         i != other.ports_.end(); ++i) {
00117                                 if (i.value()) {
00118                                         QSharedPointer<Port> copy = QSharedPointer<Port>(
00119                                                 new Port(*i.value().data()));
00120                                         ports_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00121                                 }
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 modelParameters_.clear();
00125                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> >::const_iterator i =
00126                  other.modelParameters_.begin();
00127                         i != other.modelParameters_.end(); ++i) {
00128                                 if (i.value()) {
00129                                         QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> copy = QSharedPointer<ModelParameter>(
00130                                                 new ModelParameter(*i.value().data()));
00131                                         modelParameters_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00132                                 }
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         return *this;
00136 }

00145 void Model::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00146         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:model");
00147 
00148         // write the views of the model
00149         if (views_.size() != 0) {
00150                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:views");
00151 
00152                 // go through each view
00153                 for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00154                         views_.at(i)->write(writer);
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:views
00158         }
00159 
00160         // write the ports of the model
00161         if (ports_.size() != 0) {
00162                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:ports");
00163 
00164                 const QStringList viewNames = getViewNames();
00165 
00166                 // go through each port
00167                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> >::iterator i = ports_.begin();
00168                                 i != ports_.end(); ++i) {
00169 
00170                         i.value()->write(writer, viewNames);
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:ports
00174         }
00175 
00176         // write the modelParameters of the model
00177         if (modelParameters_.size() != 0) {
00178                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:modelParameters");
00179 
00180                 // go through each modelParameter
00181                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> >::iterator i =
00182                                 modelParameters_.begin(); i != modelParameters_.end(); ++i) {
00183                         i.value()->write(writer);
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:modelParameters
00187         }
00188 
00189         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:model
00190 }

00229 bool Model::hasHierView() const {
00230 
00231         // search all views
00232         for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00233 
00234                 // if a hierarchyref is found
00235                 if (views_.at(i)->getHierarchyRef().isValid()) {
00236                         return true;
00237                 }
00238         }
00239 
00240         // if none of the views contained hierarchyrefs then return false
00241         return false;
00242 }
00243 
00244 VLNV Model::getHierRef(const QString viewName) const {
00245 
00246         // search all views
00247         for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00248 
00249                 // if the view has the given name 
00250                 // or no name is given AND the view is hierarchical
00251                 if (views_.at(i)->getName() == viewName ||
00252                                 (viewName.isEmpty() && views_.at(i)->getHierarchyRef().isValid())) {
00253                         return views_.at(i)->getHierarchyRef();
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 
00257         // if no hierarchical view was found or none matched the given name
00258         return VLNV();
00259 }

00261 void Model::setHierRef(const VLNV& vlnv, const QString& viewName /*= QString()*/ ) {
00262 
00263         // search all views
00264         foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, views_) {
00265                 
00266                 // if the view has given name or no name is given AND view is hierarchical
00267                 if (view->getName() == viewName ||
00268                         (viewName.isEmpty() && view->getHierarchyRef().isValid())) {
00269                         view->setHierarchyRef(vlnv);
00270                 }
00271         }
00272 }

00304 const QList<VLNV> Model::getHierarchyRefs() const {
00305 
00306         // list to store the pointers to VLNVs
00307         QList<VLNV> refs;
00308 
00309         // search all views
00310         for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00311 
00312                 // if view contains hierarchy reference
00313                 if (views_.at(i)->getHierarchyRef().isValid()) {
00314                         refs.append(views_.at(i)->getHierarchyRef());
00315                 }
00316         }
00317         return refs;
00318 }

00320 View* Model::findView(const QString name) const {
00321         // search all views
00322         for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00323 
00324                 // if the view has the specified name
00325                 if (views_.at(i)->getName() == name) {
00326                         return views_.at(i).data();
00327                 }
00328         }
00329 
00330         // view was not found
00331         return 0;
00332 }

00334 void Model::addView(View* newView) {
00335 
00336         // remove previous views with the same name.
00337         removeView(newView->getName());
00338 
00339         // add the new view
00340         views_.append(QSharedPointer<View>(newView));
00341 }

00343 void Model::removeView(const QString& name) {
00344 
00345         // search all views
00346         for (int i = 0; i < views_.size(); ++i) {
00347 
00348                 // if the view has the specified name
00349                 if (views_.at(i)->getName() == name) {
00350 
00351                         // remove the view
00352                         views_.removeAt(i);
00353                 }
00354         }
00355 }

00361 bool Model::addPort( QSharedPointer<Port> port ) {
00362         
00363         // if port with same name already exists
00364         if (ports_.contains(port->getName()))
00365                 return false;
00366 
00367         ports_.insert(port->getName(), port);
00368         return true;

00375 bool Model::renamePort( const QString& oldName, const QString& newName ) {
00376         
00377         // if port with old name does not exist
00378         if (!ports_.contains(oldName))
00379                 return false;
00380 
00381         QSharedPointer<Port> portP(ports_.value(oldName));
00382         ports_.remove(oldName);
00383         ports_.insert(newName, portP);
00384         return true;
00385 }

00416 General::Direction Model::getPortDirection( const QString& portName ) const {
00417 
00418         // if port is not found
00419         if (!ports_.contains(portName))
00420                 return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00421

00425 bool Model::isPhysicalPort( const QString& portName ) const {
00426         // if port is not found
00427         if (!ports_.contains(portName)) {
00428                 return false;
00429         }
00430         // if port direction is unspecified or phantom
00431         else if (ports_.value(portName)->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_INVALID ||
00432                 ports_.value(portName)->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_PHANTOM) {
00433                         return false;
00434         }
00435         // if port direction is valid
00436         else {
00437                 return true;
00438         }
00439 }

00451 QStringList Model::getFileSetRefs( const QString& viewName ) const {
00452 
00453         QStringList fileSets;
00454         foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, views_) {
00455                 if (view->getName() == viewName) {
00456                         
00457                         // if view is hierarchical and contains reference to another 
00458                         // rtl-level implementation
00459                         if (view->isHierarchical() && !view->getTopLevelView().isEmpty()) {
00460                                 fileSets += getFileSetRefs(view->getTopLevelView());
00461                         }
00462                         // if view is not hierarchical
00463                         else if (!view->isHierarchical()) {
00464                                 fileSets += view->getFileSetRefs();
00465                         }
00466                         return fileSets;
00467                 }
00468         }
00469         return fileSets;
00470 }

00488 {

00490     if (modelParameters_.contains(param->getName()))

00505 QMap<QString, QString> Model::getPortDefaultValues() const {
00506 
00507         QMap<QString, QString> defaultValues;
00508 
00509         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports_) {
00510                 
00511                 // only the in and inout ports can have default values
00512                 if (port->getDirection() == General::IN ||
00513                         port->getDirection() == General::INOUT) {
00514 
00515                                 // if port has a default value specified
00516                                 if (!port->getDefaultValue().isEmpty()) {
00517                                         defaultValues.insert(port->getName(), port->getDefaultValue());
00518                                 }
00519                                 else {
00520                                         defaultValues.insert(port->getName(), QString());
00521                                 }
00522                 }
00523         }
00524 
00525         return defaultValues;
00526 }

00528 QStringList Model::getPortTypeDefinitions() const {
00529 
00530         QStringList typeDefs;
00531         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports_) {
00532 
00533                 // get all the type defs that the port uses
00534                 QStringList portTypeDefs = port->getTypeDefinitions();
00535                 foreach (QString portType, portTypeDefs) {
00536 
00537                         // if the type def is not yet in the list and it is not empty
00538                         if (!typeDefs.contains(portType) && !portType.isEmpty()) {
00539                                 typeDefs.append(portType);
00540                         }
00541                 }
00542         }
00543         return typeDefs;
00544 }

00546 QString Model::getEntityName( const QString& viewName ) const {
00547         // search all views
00548         foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, views_) {
00549                 // if the specified view was found
00550                 if (view->getName() == viewName) {
00551 
00552                         // if view is not hierarchical
00553                         if (!view->isHierarchical()) {
00554                                 QString modelName = view->getModelName();
00555                                 int index = modelName.indexOf(QString("("), 0);
00556                                 // if '(' was found
00557                                 if (index > 0) {
00558                                         modelName.resize(index);
00559                                 }
00560                                 return modelName;
00561                         }
00562                         // if view is hierarchical
00563                         else {
00564                                 // if view references another implementation view
00565                                 if (!view->getTopLevelView().isEmpty()) {
00566                                         return getEntityName(view->getTopLevelView());
00567                                 }
00568                         }
00569                 }
00570         }
00571 
00572         return QString();
00573 }
00574 
00575 QString Model::getArchitectureName( const QString& viewName ) const {
00576         // search all views
00577         foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, views_) {
00578                 // if the specified view was found
00579                 if (view->getName() == viewName) {
00580 
00581                         // if view is not hierarchical
00582                         if (!view->isHierarchical()) {
00583                                 QString architectureName;
00584 
00585                                 QString modelName = view->getModelName();
00586                                 int index = modelName.indexOf(QString("("), 0);
00587                                 // if '(' was found
00588                                 if (index > 0) {
00589                                         // remove the '*(' so only the stuff inside brackets is used
00590                                         architectureName = modelName.remove(0, index + 1);
00591                                         // remove the last ')' from the end of the string
00592                                         architectureName.chop(1);
00593                                 }
00594                                 return architectureName;
00595                         }
00596                         // if view is hierarchical
00597                         else {
00598                                 // if view references another implementation view
00599                                 if (!view->getTopLevelView().isEmpty()) {
00600                                         return getArchitectureName(view->getTopLevelView());
00601                                 }
00602                         }
00603                 }
00604         }
00605         return QString();
00606 }
